entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 10:51 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
